channel.title: Ada Lovelace & the Analytical Engines
channel.description: Recent content on Ada Lovelace & the Analytical Engines

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Hello, world! These two words, synonymous with the adventure of learning, are typically used as an introductory program for students of a new programming language. It’s invocation brings to mind the first steps in an adventure of experimentation, exploration and collaboration. ALATAE’s (Ada Lovelace and the Analytical Engines) adventure begins with this post, where the introduction of the idea, the technologies to be explored (at least to start), and the aspirations hoped to be achieved are outlined.
